title: Changing Password Policies on Windows Server
excerpt: Enhance your network's security by implementing strong password policies on Windows Server. Learn how to configure these settings effectively.

title: Understanding Computer Architecture Components: ISA, Microarchitecture, and System Architecture
excerpt: Explore the three fundamental components of computer architecture—Instruction Set Architecture, Microarchitecture, and System Architecture—and understand how they interrelate to enable efficient computing.

title: Understanding Moore's Law and Its Impact on Computer Architecture
excerpt: Explore how Moore's Law has driven the evolution of computer architecture, leading to more functional units, cores, larger caches, and complex management units.

title: The Rise and Fall of Dennard Scaling
excerpt: Explore how Dennard Scaling influenced processor performance, its eventual decline, and the rise of GPUs in modern computing architecture.

title: Theoretical Computer Architectures: Von Neumann vs Harvard
excerpt: Discover the key differences between Von Neumann and Harvard architectures and how they influenced modern computing systems.

title: What is Pipelining?
excerpt: Discover how pipelining enables faster instruction execution in processors, along with solutions to hazards like structural, data, and control conflicts.

title: What are BIOS and UEFI?
excerpt: Learn the differences between BIOS and UEFI, their role in system boot processes, and techniques like Secure Boot and Full-Disk Encryption for better security.

title: Cryptography and the CIA Triad
excerpt: Explore how cryptography enforces Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability (CIA) while ensuring secure authentication and nonrepudiation.

title: What is Instruction Set Architecture (ISA)?
excerpt: Discover the fundamentals of ISA, its syntax, addressing modes, and its role as a critical bridge between hardware and software.

title: Computer Arithmetic
excerpt: A brief overview of computer arithmetic, covering binary numbers, two's complement, floating-point encoding, and logic gates.

title: What is Cache?
excerpt: An overview of cache memory, its role in improving system performance, cache levels, and key policies.

title: Analyzing Log Files — Juicy Details
excerpt: A write-up for GEEZET1's TryHackMe "Juicy Details" room, focusing on log file analysis to identify cyber threats.

title: Apache Log4Shell Analysis
excerpt: An analysis of the Apache Log4j vulnerability CVE-2021-44228, exploring exploitation techniques, mitigation strategies, and a walkthrough of TryHackMe's 'Solar' room.
